public void Drawpowder_svg(Context cr, int x, int y, float width, float height, double[] rgba) {
	ImageSurface temp_surface;
	Context old_cr;
	Pattern pattern = null;
	Matrix matrix = cr.Matrix;
	
	cr.Save();
	float w = 256;
	float h = 256;
	float scale = Math.Min(width / w, height / h);
	matrix.Translate(x + Math.Max(0, (width - w * scale) / 2), y + Math.Max(0, (height - h * scale) / 2));
	matrix.Scale(scale, scale);
	cr.Matrix = matrix;

	cr.Operator = Operator.Over;
	pattern = new SolidPattern(rgba[0], rgba[1], rgba[2], rgba[3]);
	cr.SetSource(pattern);
	
	cr.NewPath();
	cr.MoveTo(247.769531, 150.40625);
	cr.CurveTo(247.148438, 143.328125, 238.988281, 139.25, 231.101563, 135.304688);
	cr.CurveTo(227.9375, 133.722656, 222.664063, 131.089844, 221.710938, 129.679688);
	cr.CurveTo(218.746094, 122.066406, 217.121094, 121.34375, 204.738281, 115.839844);
	cr.CurveTo(201.140625, 114.238281, 196.667969, 112.25, 190.746094, 109.5);
	cr.CurveTo(174.609375, 102.003906, 162.144531, 91.796875, 152.125, 83.59375);
	cr.CurveTo(146.027344, 78.601563, 140.765625, 74.292969, 135.867188, 71.539063);
	cr.CurveTo(128.546875, 67.425781, 121.917969, 66.835938, 116.5, 69.585938);
	cr.CurveTo(108.480469, 73.65625, 90.566406, 93.332031, 78.667969, 103.628906);
	cr.CurveTo(62.328125, 117.773438, 32.949219, 136.167969, 19.105469, 139.816406);
	cr.CurveTo(3.683594, 143.878906, 2.246094, 155.027344, 28.289063, 158.402344);
	cr.CurveTo(74.949219, 164.453125, 64.597656, 174.898438, 110.113281, 177.5625);
	cr.CurveTo(138.546875, 179.230469, 214.550781, 169.347656, 240.003906, 159.9375);
	cr.CurveTo(242.585938, 159.230469, 244.332031, 158.207031, 245.644531, 156.789063);
	cr.CurveTo(247.246094, 155.058594, 247.984375, 152.851563, 247.769531, 150.40625);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(110.316406, 148.390625);
	cr.CurveTo(108.144531, 148.394531, 106.378906, 146.632813, 106.375, 144.457031);
	cr.CurveTo(106.375, 142.28125, 108.136719, 140.515625, 110.308594, 140.515625);
	cr.CurveTo(112.484375, 140.511719, 114.25, 142.273438, 114.253906, 144.449219);
	cr.CurveTo(114.253906, 146.621094, 112.492188, 148.390625, 110.316406, 148.390625);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(121.980469, 136.175781);
	cr.CurveTo(120.046875, 136.175781, 118.476563, 134.609375, 118.476563, 132.675781);
	cr.CurveTo(118.472656, 130.742188, 120.039063, 129.175781, 121.972656, 129.171875);
	cr.CurveTo(123.90625, 129.171875, 125.476563, 130.734375, 125.476563, 132.671875);
	cr.CurveTo(125.480469, 134.605469, 123.914063, 136.171875, 121.980469, 136.175781);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(129.878906, 155.371094);
	cr.CurveTo(127.460938, 155.375, 125.5, 153.417969, 125.496094, 151);
	cr.CurveTo(125.492188, 148.582031, 127.449219, 146.621094, 129.867188, 146.621094);
	cr.CurveTo(132.285156, 146.617188, 134.246094, 148.574219, 134.246094, 150.992188);
	cr.CurveTo(134.25, 153.40625, 132.292969, 155.367188, 129.878906, 155.371094);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(153.351563, 120.757813);
	cr.CurveTo(142.347656, 108.691406, 135.613281, 90.683594, 129.371094, 79.464844);
	cr.CurveTo(129.890625, 79.6875, 130.421875, 79.949219, 130.964844, 80.253906);
	cr.CurveTo(135.101563, 82.578125, 140.054688, 86.632813, 145.789063, 91.328125);
	cr.CurveTo(156.242188, 99.886719, 169.25, 110.535156, 186.535156, 118.566406);
	cr.CurveTo(192.527344, 121.351563, 197.042969, 123.359375, 200.671875, 124.972656);
	cr.CurveTo(206.003906, 127.34375, 209.21875, 128.773438, 210.535156, 129.796875);
	cr.CurveTo(211.167969, 130.289063, 211.363281, 130.65625, 212.425781, 133.394531);
	cr.CurveTo(214.238281, 138.054688, 219.980469, 140.925781, 226.628906, 144.25);
	cr.CurveTo(229.164063, 145.515625, 233.542969, 147.78125, 236.148438, 149.621094);
	cr.CurveTo(236.742188, 150.042969, 236.53125, 150.976563, 235.808594, 151.082031);
	cr.CurveTo(233.210938, 151.464844, 228.636719, 151.742188, 221.277344, 151.265625);
	cr.CurveTo(204.289063, 150.164063, 175.390625, 144.917969, 153.351563, 120.757813);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(70.992188, 179.578125);
	cr.CurveTo(70.992188, 182.355469, 68.738281, 184.609375, 65.964844, 184.609375);
	cr.CurveTo(63.1875, 184.609375, 60.933594, 182.355469, 60.933594, 179.578125);
	cr.CurveTo(60.933594, 176.800781, 63.1875, 174.550781, 65.964844, 174.550781);
	cr.CurveTo(68.738281, 174.550781, 70.992188, 176.800781, 70.992188, 179.578125);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(53.121094, 171.699219);
	cr.CurveTo(53.121094, 174.148438, 51.132813, 176.132813, 48.683594, 176.132813);
	cr.CurveTo(46.234375, 176.132813, 44.25, 174.148438, 44.25, 171.699219);
	cr.CurveTo(44.25, 169.25, 46.234375, 167.261719, 48.683594, 167.261719);
	cr.CurveTo(51.132813, 167.261719, 53.121094, 169.25, 53.121094, 171.699219);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(33.058594, 181.875);
	cr.CurveTo(33.058594, 184.082031, 31.269531, 185.875, 29.058594, 185.875);
	cr.CurveTo(26.851563, 185.875, 25.058594, 184.082031, 25.058594, 181.875);
	cr.CurveTo(25.058594, 179.664063, 26.851563, 177.875, 29.058594, 177.875);
	cr.CurveTo(31.269531, 177.875, 33.058594, 179.664063, 33.058594, 181.875);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(219.25, 177.75);
	cr.CurveTo(219.25, 180.027344, 217.402344, 181.875, 215.125, 181.875);
	cr.CurveTo(212.847656, 181.875, 211, 180.027344, 211, 177.75);
	cr.CurveTo(211, 175.472656, 212.847656, 173.625, 215.125, 173.625);
	cr.CurveTo(217.402344, 173.625, 219.25, 175.472656, 219.25, 177.75);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(219.25, 177.75);
	cr.Tolerance = 0.1;
	cr.Antialias = Antialias.Default;
	cr.FillRule = FillRule.Winding;
	cr.FillPreserve();
	if (pattern!= null) pattern.Dispose();

	cr.Restore();
}
